snippet: The golf tournament starts Thursday at a renowned slice of a South Carolina barrier island with a reputation as one of America’s most distinctive — and perhaps most difficult — courses.
abstract: PGA Championship golf tournament starts at Dye's Ocean Course, a renowned slice of a South Carolina barrier island with a reputation as one of America’s most distinctive, and perhaps most difficult, courses.
lead_paragraph: The golf tournament starts Thursday at a renowned slice of a South Carolina barrier island with a reputation as one of America’s most distinctive — and perhaps most difficult — courses.

headline.seo: PGA Tour Heads to Feared Ocean Course at Kiawah
headline.main: P.G.A. Championship Will Be Latest War by the Shore
headline.print_headline: P.G.A. Championship Will Be the Latest War by the Shore
